parameters.name: ContainerImageSpec
parameters.description: The configurations of the container image.

parameters.name: ImageType
parameters.description:
The type of the images. Valid values:

*   VM: virtual machine image.
*   Container: the container image.

parameters.description: The name of the custom image.

parameters.name: VMImageSpec
parameters.description: The image configuration of the virtual machine.
